quest.name: A Sluggish Endeavor
journal:
Eshana's next task is not for the squeamish.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Survey the designated location and defeat any slugs that appear.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: You are truly a sssight for sore eyes, my friend.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Our ssscouts recently had the misfortune of spotting a monstrous slug near Dimwold. Their grotesque appearance and corrosive slime─it is enough to make one ssspew.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: They mussst be dealt with, but I am ashamed to confess the Gatekeepers are ill-sssuited to fight them. The mere sight of them is enough to make mossst convulse. And those who manage to approach are then irreparably scarred by their acidic ssslavering.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Please, I beg of you─go to Dimwold and rid us of this blight on the land.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Is it done, then? Is the ssslug no more?

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: You have my humblessst thanks. If the Gatekeepers should encounter another, you can be certain we will call for you again.
